The land she has for planting is adequate and fertile, and is located in an area considered to be good for planting vegetables. She already has many customers as people prefer her business because she sells the best vegetables in the area, has the best prices, and her service is unequalled. Alba is a woman who is dedicated to her work and prepared to give her all to accomplish her goals. The most important thing to her is her family, and for this reason she works hard to give them the best. She is worried because her home is a little small and this has caused discomfort to everyone in her home. The house needs another room added on to it in order to create more space. Alba wants to do this as soon as possible for everyone’s comfort. Her greatest secret is her motivation to get ahead; she knows that she will succeed if she is motivated. She needs to invest in building materials but does not have enough capital, so she is requesting a loan from FUSAI, which will allow her to buy cement, bricks, sand, tools, etc. Alba Leticia is known in the area for her good credit history. She has taken responsibility for settling the debt and hopes that she will be able to offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, and tools

loans.name: Jose Santos

texts.es: José Santos de treinta y cuatro años  de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos menores de edad; Él se dedica a la compra y venta de madera, tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy rentable, se ha hecho de mucha experiencia en las ventas, el lugar donde comercia esta ubicado en su vivienda y es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad, por lo que ya tiene clientela fija que lo prefiere por los buenos precios, la calidad y el servicio excelente; José es un hombre dedicado a su labor y a toda su familia son las dos cosas más importantes en su vida, se esfuerza todos los días por ofrecerles un futuro mejor y una vida digna, está pendiente de todo lo que necesitan, en los últimos meses la casa ha tenido deterioros y necesita reparaciones para seguridad y comodidad de los que la habitan, pero José no cuenta con el suficiente capital que lo respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar tejas, cemento, ladrillo, etc. José Santos tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y a la vez tiene la confianza que le ofrecerá a su familia una vida plena como se la merecen.
texts.en: 34-year-old José Santos lives with his partner and his underaged children. He makes a living by buying and selling wood. He has several years of experience in his business and it is very profitable. He has acquired a lot of experience in sales. His business is located in his home and is very well-known by people in the area. He already has regular customers who prefer his business for its good prices, its quality, and its excellent service. Jose is a man who is dedicated to his work and to his whole family; they are the two most important things in his life. He strives every day to offer them a better future and a decent life, and is always attentive to their needs. In recent months the house has deteriorated and it needs repairs so that its inhabitants are safe and comfortable, but José does not have enough capital for backing. For this reason, he decided to request a loan from FUSAI, which will allow him to buy tiles, cement, bricks, etc. José Santos has a good credit history and he is very responsible. He says he will be able to settle the debt in the established period and is confident that he will offer his family the full life that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy tiles, cement, and bricks

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es: Fausto de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; Él posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad y variedades además es jornalero se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijol, tiene muchos años en su labor y ha ganado mucha experiencia en el comercio que le permite obtener muy buenas ganancias, ya tiene clientela fija que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios además del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden del cliente, Fausto es responsable, humilde y muy luchador siempre está buscando las mejores alternativas que le permitan alcanzar el éxito; es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo y a toda su familia porque quiere ofrecerles una vida digna, en las ultimas semanas decidió mejorar la vivienda para mayor comodidad, necesita construir un muro y además poner piso, pero Fausto no cuenta con capital que lo respalde por eso se decidió a solicitarle a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar arena, cemento, hierro, ladrillo de piso, etc., Fausto tiene buenas referencias de pago y está feliz con la ayuda, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el período establecido y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: 46-year-old Fausto lives with his partner. He owns a store where he sells staples and other items. He is also a day labourer who plants corn and beans. He has done this work for many years and has gained a lot of experience in trade, which allows him to obtain very good profits. He now has regular customers who prefer his business for the quality of his products, the reasonable prices, and the unequalled service. Fausto is responsible, humble, and a fighter. His is always looking for the best options which will allow him to succeed. He is dedicated to his work and to his family because he wants to give them a decent life. In recent weeks he has decided to improve his home for greater comfort. He needs to build a wall and put down a floor, but Fausto does not have the capital he needs. For this reason, Fausto decided to request a loan from FUSAI, which will allow him to purchase sand, cement, iron, brick flooring, etc. Fausto has a good credit history and is happy with the help. He says he will be able to settle the debt in the established period and at the same time he will give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, iron, and flooring

loans.name: Rukhsana

texts.en:
Rukhsana is a 39-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. Four years back, she started her business of cloth sales to contribute to the family income, as her husband and one son were the only earners of the family, and it was very tough for Rukhsana to manage her household needs with the small income of her husband and son. 

She purchases a variety of cloth from the main city and then resells them to the people of her vicinity. She has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her locality. 

Rukhsana requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) from Kashf Foundation to buy stock of different cloth of the summer season by taking in account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy stock of different cloth of the summer season.

loans.name: Chhan

texts.en:
Chhan, aged 61 and a widower, is a hardworking man who has been involved in fishing activities for years to make enough income to provide food for his family. Seeing the hard situations in the family, most of Chhan’s children decided to start working to financially help their father. Three of them are working in garment factories. 

The previous loan that he received helped him to buy a motorcycle for his employed children commuting to their workplaces. Only one motorcycle, however, does not provide the full support they needed because they have separate work locations. In this regard, he is now requesting a loan of $1,200 to buy one motorcycle more to encourage his children to work without having to pay for a taxi monthly. He appreciates the loan support.

loans.use: to buy one motorcycle more to encourage his children to work without having to pay for a taxi monthly.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.en:
Gabriel is a 45-year-old who is in the motorcycle-transport business and is a shop retailer in Kongowea, Mombasa. He is a married father whose wife earns additional income; together, they support eight people, and they have been into these businesses for the last two years, doing well.

This marks his second borrowing after successfully servicing the previous loan from KADET Ltd. He will use the requested money to service his motorcycles and purchase stock for his retail shop, and the anticipated profit will be used to service his loan. He hopes to be successful in life.

loans.use: to service his motorcycles and purchase stock for his retail shop.

loans.name: Mayra Azucena

texts.es:
Mayra tiene 29 años de edad de estado civil Unión Libre tiene dos hijos vive con el compañero y con los hijos en el Recinto Terrenal perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla TERRENAL se encuentra ubicada el  recinto TERRENAL, perteneciente al cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Mayra se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades.  Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Pueblo Viejo. 

El sueño es tener dinero para poder amoblar la casa ya que le falta muchas cosas importantes, en los tiempos libres le gusta ver las novelas de las ocho de la noche.
texts.en:
Mayra is 29 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. She lives with her companion and their children in the precinct of Terrenal, which is in the canton of Pueblo Viejo, Los Ríos Province.

Mayra is a member of the Communal Bank “Terrenal”, which is located in the precinct of Terrenal in the canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members engage in farm work and raising livestock.

Mayra is a farmer who grows corn and rice. With this loan, she will buy supplies such as fertilizers, compost, and insecticides so that she can prevent pests and diseases. Her purchases will be conducted in the city of Pueblo Viejo. Her dream is to have money to furnish her house since it is lacking many important things.

In her free time, Mayra enjoys watching the soap operas that come on at 8:00 P.M.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, and insecticides.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es:
Teresa,  se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo  porque requiere de más capital de trabajo para seguir generando ingresos económicos; esta inversión le ayudara a comprar ropa para damas y caballeros, tales como: blusas, camisas, pantalones, entre otros.
Las condiciones económicas han mejorado, ya que gracias al crédito anterior obtuvo ganancias favorables y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado porque cuenta con más oportunidades para prepararse académicamente.
texts.en:
Teresa is presenting a new loan request because she needs more operating capital so that she can continue generating income. This investment will help her to buy clothes for women and men such as blouses, shirts, trousers, and other items.

Her financial condition has improved. Thanks to her previous loan, she was able to earn a favorable income. Her family circumstances are optimal because her children have more opportunities to prepare themselves academically.

loans.use: to buy blouses, shirts, trousers, and other articles of clothing for men and women.

loans.name: Aasia

texts.en:
Aasia is a 27-year-old married woman and a mother of three. She is a hardworking mother who is helping her family by providing services of tailoring in her community. She has been doing it for many years and very well knows the techniques of stitching. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns enough to lead a decent life. 

To help her continue operations of her business, she requested a loan of 30,000 PKR (Pakistan rupees) to buy stock of threads in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and needles to meet the increasing demand. In addition to repaying the loan, she will use part of the revenues to deal with personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy stock of threads in different colors along with packs of zippers, buttons and needles.

loans.name: Good Luck Group

texts.en:
Nazia is a 32-year-old married woman living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a small garment factory in which he sews pants, shirts, trousers and T-shirts. He takes the orders in large quantities and sews the garments in the specific given period. He has been sewing the garments since 2008, without an overlock machine. He had been taking the garments to outside over-lock services and paying a healthy amount against these services. Now he wants to buy an over-lock machine of his own, but he does not have the finances to purchase the machine.

Nazia requested a loan of 50,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) from Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for her husband, so that he would be able to buy an over-lock machine and save money.

Nazia is in her fifth loan cycle, and she has shown excellent repayment behavior. This time, she is representing herself as a group leader due to her excellent repayment behavior. 

Nazia is very thankful to Kiva’s field partner BRAC Pakistan for this honorable favor.

Note: Nazia is raising her hand in the picture.

loans.use: To buy an overlock machine for the small garment factory.

loans.name: Kipkosgei

texts.en:
Kipkosgei is a married man, aged 38, who is blessed with five children. He runs a business of selling dry cereals in the Chepsigot location and has been in the business for a period of seven years, earning an income of 32,000 KES (Kenyan shillings) monthly.

He is now servicing his seventh loan of 100,000 KES from KADET LTD and wishes to use this amount to purchase stock of dry maize for resale and also pay the transport charges. The profits he earns will be used to repay the loan and increase stock of cereals.

His dream is to see his business expand.

loans.use: to purchase stock of dry maize and pay for transportation.

loans.name: Majeed

texts.en:
Majid is a 47-year-old single man living on a farm in a village in Mount Lebanon. In fact, he earns his living by planting, harvesting and selling fruits and vegetables. He also provides for one of his family members.

Majid is a hard worker with a certain handicap that makes farming a bit of a challenge to him. He plants seasonal fruits and vegetables in addition to organic products that he delivers to specified customers. He needs the loan in order to purchase seeds, plastic boxes and necessary updated tools, which are materials that would facilitate the farming and trading process for him. 

As for the future, Majid wishes to acquire a bigger part of land in order to maximize his benefit, and to own a special storage fridge to keep his products fresh.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, plastic boxes and necessary updated tools.

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: La Sra. Maribel tiene 24 años, tiene un hijito de un añito de edad, se dedica  a la fabricación y venta de cotillones y piñatas para todo tipo de acontecimientos ya sea bautizos matrimonios, fiestas de quince años, ella entrega a distintas tiendas, mercados, y también le hacen pedido para el decorado de fiestas,  es una cliente nueva de la institución , con el dinero del crédito comprara  material para la fabricación de piñatas y cotillones y así brindar variedad de cotillones a sus clientes , La Sra. Maribel se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad que se le brinda para crecer en su negocio y de esta manera genera más ingresos para el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Maribel is 24 years old and has a one-year-old son. She makes and sells party favors and piñatas for all types of events such as baptisms, weddings, and quinceañeras. Maribel delivers her products to different stores and markets, but she also gets requests to handle party decorations.

Maribel is a new client of Emprender. With the money from this loan, she will buy materials for making piñatas and party favors so that she can offer a variety of products to her customers. Sra. Maribel is very grateful for the opportunity she has received so that she can grow her business and generate more income for the welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for making piñatas and party favors.

loans.name: Blemaa's Group

texts.en:
Blema is a group composed of 12 Ghanaian women and 1 man living in Teshie-Accra. They decided to join hands and form the group in order to acquire a loan from Kiva through ID-Ghana, and to support each other financially.

Theresa is the featured member of the group. She is a 54-year-old married mother of two children, standing third from left in the photograph. She sells sandals and slippers. Her husband is also a businessman. However, their combined revenue is not sufficient to provide enough to sustain the family and their businesses.

Furthermore, Theresa's children are of school-going ages, so she needs a loan to sell enough to cover her childrens' fees and other expenses. She will use her share of the loan to purchase two slippers and sandals, as well as supplies for her customers, therefore expanding her business. 

As for the other group members, they are in the sales of fish, fruits, plastic baskets, rice, flour, oil, and grocery items, all of which are showcased in the photograph. Together they need a total amount of 5,200 Ghana Cedis (GHS) to expand their businesses.

loans.use: To purchase two slippers and sandals, as well as supplies for her customers, therefore expanding her business.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is a single mother of three children and only one of her children goes to school. She also takes care of additional family members (cousin and brother). She has a business tailoring and has been in this business for 10 years. She has applied for a loan of 500,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT-SACCO to buy more rolls of clothing material and thread. She generates additional income through rental houses. She works in a shop six days  every week and sells on a retail basis. Her major business challenges are seasonality and defaulters. She aspires to own three more sewing machines and also to build more rental rooms. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and paying utility bills.

loans.use: To buy more rolls of clothing material and thread.

loans.name: Rosa Merari

texts.es:
Rosa es una joven de 23 años de edad, es madre de dos hijos y en compañía de su compañero de hogar viven humilde mente ya agradece a DIOS por tener una familia bien consolidada. Sus hijos el primero con una edad de 4 años y el menor con 18 meses dependen de ellos en todos los aspectos por lo cual juntos como pareja trabajan arduamente en sus cultivos de café, maíz y frijoles ya que es el único patrimonio para darles el sustento a sus hijos. Sus cultivos de café están a la par de su casa por lo cual les es fácil dar el mantenimiento y asistencia técnica como: poda, limpieza, fertilización, entre otros.

Actualmente ella solicita un financiamiento a la cooperativa COMIXMUL para mejorar su producción de café comprando los insumos necesarios para su mantenimiento y atención. 

Ella espera que se le apoye con su solicitud ya que es el único medio de ingreso para que ellos puedan cumplir con sus sueños en su familia poder apoyar a sus hijos el día que ellos estudien y formar un patrimonio sólido para su futuro. De esta manera quedara satisfecha y con mucha puntualidad cumplirá con el compromiso para poder seguir gozando de sus beneficios y demás servicios.
texts.en:
Rosa is 23 years old. She is mother to two children. She lives with her partner and they live very simply. She gives thanks to God for her family. Their children, the first of which is 4 years old and the youngest of which is 18 month, are completely dependent on them so the couple works hard growing their coffee, corn, and bean crops because this is the only source of income they have to support their children. Their coffee plants are located next to their house, so it’s easy to maintain them via: pruning, weeding, and fertilizing, among other things. 

She is now requesting a loan from the COMIXMUL communal bank to improve her production of coffee by buying the inputs necessary for its maintenance and attention. 

She hopes that they will support her request because it is the only source of income that will allow them to achieve their dreams. As a family, they want to support their children in their studies and give them a solid base for their future. In this way, she would be very happy and will make her repayments punctually so that she can continue enjoying the benefits and other services.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, urea, and folial fertilizers, among other thing for her crops.

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, se le presenta la necesidad de optar por un nuevo préstamo porque requiere de más capital de trabajo; esta inversión le permitirá comprar harina, pan francés, aceite, pan dulce, entre otros.
El efecto del crédito anterior fue favorable,  las condiciones económicas y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado,  ya que le permitió aumentar sus utilidades y mejoro su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan has chosen to request another loan because he needs more operating capital. This investment will enable him to buy flour, French bread, oil, sweet bread, and other items.

The effect of his previous loan was favorable. His financial condition and family circumstances have become optimal. In addition, he has increased his profits and improved his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy flour, French bread, oil, sweet bread, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Jose

texts.es: Doña Maria es originaria de Estelí. Es de oficio comerciante. Ella se dedica a vender productos congelados como: pollo, embutidos, Papas precosidas etc. Le ha ido muy bien ha surtido de nuevos productos comestibles su negocio poco a poco ha ido creciendo como comerciante  logrando su meta propuesta, logrando vender nuevos productos. Este nuevo crédito  lo quiere para comprar granos básicos como: Arroz, azúcar, frijol, aceite, embutidos y frezer.  Su meta futuro es seguir creciendo y brindando satisfacción a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Maria is a native of Estelí and she is a shopkeeper. She sells frozen goods such as: chicken, lunchmeats, pre-cooked potatoes, etc. Her business has done well, she has stocked new groceries at her business and has grown bit by bit as a businesswoman achieving her proposed goal of selling new products.

She would like a new loan to purchase a freezer and to purchase basic goods such as: rice, sugar, beans, oil and lunchmeats.

Her goal for the future is to continue expanding and bringing satisfaction to her clients.

loans.use: to purchase a freezer and basic goods such as: rice, sugar, beans, oil and lunchmeats.

loans.name: Christiana

texts.en: This is thirty-one-year-old Christiana. She is married and has three children aged four, seven and twelve. She has one additional dependent who lives with her, a younger sister, to help with her education. In 1998, Christiana established her plastic slippers, sandals and shoes business. The business started after she dropped out of school to be self-reliant. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about SLL 930,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 4,000,000. Christiana has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to pay for additional plastic slippers and shoes. She hopes that this loan can improve her stock and raise her profit. In the future, Christiana plans to increase the size of the stall and add stock and hopes to be able to take care of her children's education. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for plastic slippers and shoes.

loans.name: Ciduar

texts.es:
Delmar es un joven de 24 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura, especialmente se cultivan productos como algodón, paprika, esparrago, entre otros.  Desde muy pequeño Delmar aprendió a trabajar ya que tenia la necesidad de apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar, es por ello que no pudo estudiar una carrera universitaria, ya que solo estudio hasta el quinto año de secundaria.

Delmar trabaja cada día como estibador y ayudante en un pequeño negocio de abarrotes en el mercado de la ciudad, el labora alrededor de 9 horas al día, a pesar de lo duro del trabajo Delmar se siente orgullosos, ya que es un trabajo honrado y con el cual puede salir adelante.

Delmar está muy agradecido con los prestatarios kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá realizar la reparación del techo de su vivienda, por ello comprara materiales de construcción como cemento, arena, entre otros, con lo cual podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida y poder tener mayor seguridad, así el seguirá trabajando cada día para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Tener un gran empresa y estudiar una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Delmar is 24 years old. He lives in the city of Ica, which is characterized by having a warm and welcoming climate. People there work in agriculture, especially products such as cotton, paprika, and asparagus, among other things. Delmar has worked from the time he was very young, since he needed to help his parent with the household expenses. He wasn’t able to study in college because he only finished fifth grade.

Delmar works every day as a porter and assistant in a small grocery store in the city. He works around 9 hours per day. Despite how hard his job is, Delmar is proud because it is an honest job and one where he can get ahead. 

Delmar is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because it is thanks to the help they have provided that he will be able to repair the roof of his house. He will buy construction materials such a cement and sand, among other things. He will be able to have a better quality of life and also be safer. He will continue working every day so can achieve his greatest dream: “To have a big business and study at university.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair his roof.

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es:
Doña Maria  es originaria de Estelí. De oficio comerciante, es dueña de pulpería. Ella esta agradecida con kiva ya que  su primer crédito  lo utilizo para surtir su negocio, le ha ido muy bien, sus ventas mejoraron, logro satisfacer las demandas que tenía.
Ahora ella está solicitando este nuevo crédito para comprar productos tales como: granos básicos, arroz, frijol, azúcar, aceite y cosméticos. Su meta futuro es tener la mejor pulpería de su sector y  obtener mejores  ingresos.
texts.en:
Maria is a native of Estelí. She is a merchant who owns her own "pulpería" [small convenience store]. 

She is grateful to Kiva because she was able to use her first loan to stock her business. Things have gone well, her sales improved and she was able to satisfy the demand she had.

She now requests a new loan to purchase products such as basic grains, rice, beans, sugar and oil; and cosmetics. 

Her goal for the future is to have the best "pulpería" in the area and to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase products such as grains, rice, beans, sugar, oil and cosmetics.

loans.name: Ana Aracely

texts.es:
Ana Aracely es una joven de 29 años de edad luchadora con un grado de escolaridad de primaria no completada madre soltera de 2 hijos. Muy temprano por la mañana en compañía de su hermano se va hacia el campo a trabajar la agricultura en lo que es la siembra de hortalizas (papa, brócoli y coliflor) siendo ellos los únicos que se involucran en las actividades del campo. Su producto es comercializado a través de intermediarios que llegan a la zona, vecinos y amigos que conocen de su producto; pero como toda siembra y cultivo no deja de tener riesgo siendo estos las plagas y la variación de precios en el mercado. El terreno que en compañía de su hermano trabaja está a una distancia de 20 minutos de camino al cual se trasladan diariamente a pie.  

Actualmente solicita ayuda para poder comprar abono, fertilizantes entre otros insumos que protegerán sus cultivos de bichos, plagas, etc. por medio de esto ella podrá asegurar sus cultivos y obtener una mejor ganancia del mismo.

Su metas a futuro es comprar una parcela más de tierra con las ganancias para poder cultivar más hortaliza y poder brindar una variedad a sus clientes para su compra/venta; pero la prioridad de ella es ver a sus hijos convertidos en profesionales teniendo una mejor educación y a sí mismo un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
29-year-old Ana Aracely is a fighter. She studied elementary education, however she could not complete her schooling as she is a single mother of two children. 

Early each morning, she accompanies her brother to the countryside where they cultivate vegetables (potatoes, broccoli and cauliflower). They are the only ones who farm there. They market their produce through intermediaries who come to the area. Their neighbors and friends are familiar with their produce. However, like all businesses, planting and cultivation is not without its risks which are crop pests and fluctuations in market prices. The land that Ana Aracely farms with her brother is around a 20 minute walk from her home.

Ana Aracely is requesting the assistance of a loan to buy fertilizer, manure and other supplies that will protect their crops from insects, pests, etc. This will help ensure a good crop harvest and help them to increase their profits.

Her future goal is to buy another plot of land so that she can grow more vegetables and offer a wider variety to her customers. However, her priority is to see her children have a better education, so that they can become professionals and have a better future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, manure and other supplies for her potato crops.

loans.name: Domitila Aurora

texts.es:
Domitila tiene 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Imperial, Domitila es una joven que ha atravesado momentos difíciles pero a pesar de ello sigue luchando por salir adelante, ya que es madre de un pequeño de 5 años de edad, al cual quiere muchísimo y por el cual daría la vida con tal de darle lo mejor.
 
Cada día  Domitila trabaja para poder sacar adelante a su pequeño, ella labora como obrera de un fundo agrícola de su distrito, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia, a pesar de lo tedioso y cansado de su labor sigue adelante ya que de ello depende que su hijo tenga una vida digna.

Domitila esta muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá  comprar materiales de construcción como cemento y arena para realizar mejoras en su vivienda, especialmente colocar un piso de cemento, ya que actualmente solo es de tierra; de esta manera seguirá trabajando y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a s hijo y una buena calidad de vida”.
texts.en:
Domitila is 29 years old and lives in the city of Imperial. Domitila is a young woman who has gone through a difficult time, but in spite of this she continues to strive to get ahead since she is the mother of a small five-year-old son, whom she loves very much and for whom she would give her life in order to give him the best.

Every day Domitila works in order to support her child. She works as a farm worker in her district for approximately nine hours a day. Despite the tedium and exhaustion of her work, she continues working because she depends on her job as a means to give her son a decent life.

Domitila is very grateful to Kiva lenders since thanks to the help they have given her she will be able to buy building materials, such as cement and sand, in order to make improvements to her home like putting down a cement floor, since currently it is only an earth floor. In this way she will continue working and she will be able to continue fighting in order to make her greatest dream of “giving her son a profession and a good quality of life” a reality.

loans.use: to purchase building materials

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase used clothing to sell

loans.name: Redwan

texts.en: Redwan is a 20-year-old man. He lives in Ibb, Yemen. His educational background is secondary school. His business is in a high traffic area, which makes it a main source of income. He started working in a shoe store with his cousin. Two years ago, he bought this store from his cousin. He already attracted numbers of regular customers and improved the family's income. The business has been successful in the most recent years. Therefore, he is planning to expand the business. So he is requesting a loan of 400,000 YER from AMB to buy ladies' and men's shoes to increase his income and have more customers. In the future, Redwan hopes to increase his profit and improve his living conditions as well as to buy a car, which will facilitate his work.

loans.use: to buy ladies' and men's shoes to sell

loans.name: Thaimu

texts.en: This is 36-year-old Thaimu.  He is married and has three children aged three, four and eight years old. He has two additional dependents who live with him to help his younger sisters with their education.  In 2002, Thaimu established his used clothing business. He began his business because he wanted to be self-reliant after coming from the village. His business is located in city center and his main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, he earns about Le 1,712,190 every month from this business. He would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Thaimu has already received and successfully repaid four loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional bales of used men's vests. He hopes that this loan can improve his stock and raise his profits. In the future, Thaimu plans to open outlets and improve the store that has been rented. He started the business with one bale of used clothing and now has started selling at wholesale. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase used clothing

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en: This is 29-year-old Aminata.  She is married and has two children who are five and nine years old. In 1999, Aminata established her plastic products (sandals, slippers, shoes and sneakers) business. She started the business to help her husband in running the affairs of the home. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,915,950 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 5,000,000. Aminata has already received and successfully repaid three loans and now requires a new loan in order to pay for additional slippers and sandals. She hopes that this loan can improve her stock and raise her profit. In the future, Aminata plans to move to a shop and expand the business to used clothing. She hopes to be able to take care of her children's education. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy plastic shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to reimburse another, higher-interest loan, and to buy more seafood to sell.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en: This is 33-year-old Musu.  She is married and has two children who are two and six years old. In 2006, Musu established her earrings, chains, blouses, trousers, baby clothing and powder business. She began her business to help her husband with running the affairs of the home. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,590,950 every month from this business. She would like a loan of Le 3,000,000. Musu has already received and successfully repaid one loan and now requires a new loan to pay for additional blouses, slippers and bags. She hopes that this loan can improve her stock and increase her profit. In the future, Musu plans to expand the business to a shop. She hopes to be able to raise enough profit to take care of the children's education. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy blouses, slippers and bags to sell

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos tiene 50 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos. Se dedica a la comercialización de artículos de limpieza de casa en casa y también trabaja con el cultivo de maíz dichas actividades la realiza desde hace 10 años. Él cultiva 10,500 metros cuadrados de maíz, la cosecha lo utiliza para el consumo de su familia y otra parte la comercializa con vecinos y amigos. El cultiva junto con la ayuda de un hijo quien le apoya en el trabajo agrícola y en velar porque que la producción sea la mejor.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar abono, pesticidas, herbicidas para la temporada de postrera y poder cultivar junto a su hijo.

Con el préstamo, cultivara un año mas y con su esfuerzo y en espera de tener un buen invierno el podrá cosechar y obtener ganancias que le ayuden a cubrir sus gastos y los de su familia.

Sin la inversión,  se hubiese limitado a no cultivar o en menos cantidad de lo que va a cultivar. A futuro tiene como meta solicitar un crédito más grande y lo piensa invertir en mejorar a la vivienda y mejorar las condiciones de la misma.
texts.en: Marcos is 50 years old, married, and has two children. He sells cleaning supplies from door to door and also grows sweetcorn. He has been doing both for ten years. His sweetcorn field has a surface of 10,500 square metres. The harvest feeds the family, with the surplus being sold to neighbours and friends. Marcos tills the land with the help of his son: together, they take care of the harvest and do their best to have as productive a farm as possible. The loan Marcos asks for will be used to to buy fertiliser, pesticides, and herbicides for the last harvest of the season. He and his son will thus be able to cultivate the land for one more year. They hope for a clement winter in order to be able to harvest properly and generate enough income to pay for household expenses. Without the loan, Marcos would have had to sow a smaller area, or even not at all. His goals for the future are to take out a more substantial loan in order to improve his house and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fertiliser, pesticides, and herbicides for the last harvest of the season.

loans.name: Gulafsho

texts.ru: Гулафшо трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 43 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 несовершеннолетних детей. Ее сыну 14 лет и дочери 9 лет. Ее муж занимается перевозкой грузов. Гулафшо всегда мечтала иметь собственное дело. После замужества сама жизнь заставила ее начать свой бизнес. При поддержке мужа, она начала бизнес купле продажей обувью. Вначале у нее было маленький оборотный капитал. Гулафшо упорно трудилась и благодаря ее терпению и труду сегодня ее бизнес развевается. Гулафшо хочет увеличить оборотный капитал для нового сезона, но не имеет достаточно денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2100 долларов США для покупки обуви для расширения ассортимента товара. Этот займ для нее является 5 циклом, и она имеет хорошею кредитную историю. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Gulafsho is a hardworking woman.  She is 43 years old.  She is married and is raising two minor children. Her son is 14 years old and her daughter is 9. Her husband works transporting cargo. Gulafsho has always dreamed of having her own business. After marriage, life has forced her to start a business. Before the support of her husband, she started a business buying and selling shoes. At first, she had little working capitol. Gulafsho worked hard, and due to her patience and hard work, her business is now growing. Gulafsho wants to increase her working capitol for the new season, but does not have enough money.  She has requested a loan in the amount of 2100 U.S. dollars for the purchase of shoes in order to increase the variety of merchandise she offers.  This is her 5th loan cycle for her, and she has a good credit history.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy shoes for widening the assortment of goods

loans.name: Bibirajab

texts.ru: Бибираджабу 42 года. Она мать одиночка. Бибираджаб имеет 2 дочерей. Им 15 и 18 лет. Бибираджаб не смотря на плохое состояние здоровья, упорно работает для обеспечения своих дочерей. Им не на кого надеется. Бибираджаб более 10 лет занимается собственным бизнесом. Она занимается купле продажей продуктов питания. Бибираджаб продает такие продукты как хлеб, масло, сахар, картошка и т.п. Она старается предоставить своим клиентам продукты с высшим качеством, так как здоровое питание является гарантом здорового образа жизни. Бибираджаб желает всем людям здоровья. Она хочет увеличить оборотный капитал и таким образом получать больше дохода, так как ее дочери выросли и требуют больше благ. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2800 долларов США для покупки продуктов питания для расширения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bibirajab is 42 years old. She is a single mother.  She has 2 daughters. They are 15 and 18 years old.  Despite her poor health, Bibirajab works tirelessly to provide for her daughters. They have no one to rely on. For more than 10 years, Bibirajab has been operating her own business. She buys and sells food products. Bibirajab sells food products such as bread, butter, sugar, potatoes, and so forth. She tries to provide her customers with products of the highest quality, because healthy eating guarantees a healthy lifestyle. Bibirajab wishes everyone to have good health. She wants to increase her working capitol and thus increase her income, as her daughters are growing and in need of more. She has requested a loan in the amount of 2800 U.S. dollars for the purchase of food products to expand her business.  She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy food products to increase working capital

loans.name: Ismayil

texts.en:
Ismayil is an IDP (internally displaced person) from Fizuli city. Now he lives in the Fizuli region with his family. Ismayil is 43 years old, married, and has two children, a daughter and a son. His daughter goes to school and his son goes to university. His daughter wants to be a journalist. 

Ismayil started his business nine years ago raising sheep. Now he needs a loan of 2,000 AZN to repair his farm. He wants to use the money for his family's future. In the future, Ismayil wants to have more sheep and to buy calves for his farm. This will be more profitable for his business. Ismayil is thankful to Komak and Kiva for supporting him.

loans.use: to repair his farm

loans.name: Emilio Nibar

texts.es:
Emilio tiene 68 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad, de clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, entre otros. Emilio tiene una alegría y vitalidad contagiante, con la cual sale adelante cada día y le permite trabajar con mucho entusiasmo en su negocio de elaboración de esteras, negocio que le permite poder tener ingresos para vivir y poder salir adelante junto a su esposa.

Emilio está muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá solventar os gastos para poder tramitar su título de propiedad, con lo cual podrá brindarle seguridad a su familia, de esta manera trabajara mejor y podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a sus hijos”.
texts.en: Emilio is 68 years old. He lives in the town of Ica, known for its warm and welcoming climate, its cotton fields, and its vineyards. Emilio's happiness and joy are infectious and they help him pull through every day. He works enthusiastically at his rush-mat business, thanks to which he derives the income needed to support himself and his wife. Emilio is very grateful to Kiva lenders, since, thanks to their help, he will be able to pay for his property title fees, which means security for his family. He will thus be able to work with a greater peace of mind and to keep fighting to make his greatest dream come true: "I want to make sure my children learn a proper job".

loans.use: to pay for property title fees.

loans.name: Tamar

texts.en:
Tamar is 62 years old and lives in the littoral town of Kobuleti. She is unmarried, retired and lives with her sister. Tamar owns commercial space and a flat in Kobuleti and rents them. The rent is source of income for Tamar and her sister. 

Tamar wants to supplement her family's income by renovating her second house so she can rent it out seasonally. Summertime is the high season in Kobuleti and several people have already expressed an interest in living there, but she has been unable to get a loan from several local financial institutions to pay for renovations. That is why she is requesting a loan from Kiva and Credo, which help people who do not qualify for conventional loans. She will use the loan to buy the materials she needs to renovate her house. Tamar hopes that renting out the rooms will be profitable and increase her income so that she and her sister can improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to renovate the house so that it can be rented out.

loans.name: Farangiz

texts.ru: Фарангиз жительница района Носири Хусрав. Ей 26 лет. Она замужем, но еще детей не имеет. Фарангиз живет с мужем, свёкорю и свекровью. У них имеется приусадебный участок земли 0,20 га, на котором выращивается сельскохозяйственная культура. А также в их домашнем хозяйстве имеется две коровы. В настоящий момент Фарангиз вместе с мужем собирается начать животноводческий бизнес. Их интересует купля и продажа крупно-рогатого скота. Фарангиз планирует закупать по 5-голов бычков, откармливать их в течение одного месяца и продавать на скотном рынке. Стартовый капитал Фарангиза составляет 2000 сомони (TJS). Она обратилась за кредитом в размере 2000 долларов США, чтобы реализовать цель. Фарангиз на сумму кредита и сбережения хочет купить 5-голов бычков и корм для скота.
texts.en: Farangiz resides in the Nosiri Khustav region.  She is 26 years old.  She is married but does not yet have children. Farangiz lives with her husband and parents-in-law. They have an adjacent 0.2 hectare piece of land on which they grow crops. They also have two cows in their household.  Currently, Farangiz and her husband are preparing to open a livestock business. They are interested in purchasing and selling cattle. Farangiz plans to purchase 5 heads of cattle, feed them over the course of a month, and then sell them at the livestock market.  The starting capitol for Farangiz is 2000 somons. She has requested a loan in order to meet her goal. Farangiz wants to use the loan and her savings to purchase 5 heads of cattle and livestock feed.

loans.use: to purchase 5 heads of cattle and feed for livestock

loans.name: Pedro Carlos

texts.es:
Pedro tiene 53 años, vive al lado de su esposa con la cual tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad, su vivienda se ubica en el distrito de Parcona, el cual se caracteriza por tener un clima caluroso en todo el año, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, paprika, entre otros.  Cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta mucho salir a pasear con su esposa ya que siempre es bueno distraerse de los problemas nos comenta Pedro, en ocasiones le pide a su esposa que le prepare uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual es el riquísimo “Ceviche”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos él solo tuvo estudios secundarios, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar la carrera de Electrónica.

Día a día Pedro trabaja como chofer de taxi, al igual que muchas personas en nuestro país, el trabaja en este tipo de negocio ya que es el único medio en el cual puede solventar a su familia y con él puede salir adelante, el trabaja alrededor de 10 horas al día y puede atender hasta 40 clientes en el día; él cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es muy carismático con los clientes.

Pedro está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y con ello podrá comprar mercadería como fideos, azúcar, atún, entre otros; para iniciar un negocio de venta de abarrotes, con lo cual podrá tener un ingreso extra para los gastos del hogar y seguir trabajando y luchando cada día para hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Tener una mejor calidad de vida”.
texts.en: Pedro is 53 years old and lives with his wife, with whom he has two children, who are now adults. He lives in Parcona, a place known for its all-year-round warm climate, its cotton fields, its vineyards, and its spice-growing industry. In his spare time, Pedro loves to go for a stroll with his wife, the perfect way, he says, to forget about your problems. He sometimes asks his wife to make him one of his favourites dishes, ceviche (raw fish marinated in lemon). Owing to scarce financial resources, Pedro completed only secondary education, but he would have liked to study electronics. Pedro works day in, day out as a taxi driver, as do many of his compatriots. He works about ten hours a day and can have as many as 40 customers in one day. He attributes his success to his amiability towards customers and to his natural charisma. Pedro is very grateful to Kiva lenders since this is the second time that they help him. Thanks to this loan, he will be able to buy merchandise, such as pasta, sugar, and tuna, in order to start a new business, namely, a grocery shop. He hopes this will generate more income, which would really come in handy for household expenses. His wish is to keep working and fighting every day to make his greatest dream come true: "I want to have a better life".

loans.use: to buy merchandise in order to start a new business.

loans.name: Arcadio José

texts.es: Arcadio, a sus 47 años de edad es padre de 3 hijos y está separado, ya que su pareja lo abandonó, dejándolo a cargo de sus hijos. Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió todas las labores de agricultura, gracias a su padre, quien le enseñó a cultivar tierras cuando cumplió la mayoría de edad. Actualmente posee cultivos de varias especies de ñame y cuando recoge la cosecha, va a venderla a la plaza del pueblo donde reside y, de esta manera ha obtenido los ingresos necesarios para darle el sustento a sus hijos. Arcadio es un hombre trabajador, pujante y dedicado a su familia y a su labor por ello solicita el crédito, para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abonos, fungicidas, fertilizantes), con el fin de darle continuidad al cuidado de sus cultivos y poder sacar una mejor cosecha, que pueda vender a un mejor precio en el mercado y así aumentar los ingresos para seguir llevando el alimento a su hogar.  Arcadio sueña con tener muchas tierras con cultivos, que le permita ofrecer oportunidades de empleo y mejore la estabilidad económica para brindarle a sus hijos una excelente educación y mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Arcadio, 47, has three children in his care since his wife divorced him and left.  He was born and raised in the country where he learned all about farming thanks to his father who taught him to cultivate the land when he became an adult.

He now grows different varieties of yams which he sells at harvest time in the main plaza of the village where he lives.  He is able to earn enough income to support his children.

Arcadio is a hard-working, responsible man who is dedicated to his family and his work.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to improve his harvest and get a better market price so he can increase his income and continue putting food on the table.  He dreams of having a lot of cropland where he can offer employment and improve his economic stability to give his children an excellent education and better lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy farm supplies (fertilizers and fungicides).

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер житель города Куляб, занимающийся скотоводством. Ему 31 год. Он женат и является отцом двоих детей. С ними также живут его отец, мать и братья.  Алишер в течение 5 лет занимается куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. Сейчас в его хозяйстве имеется один бык ярославской породы.  Для продвижения деятельности ему необходимо увеличить поголовье скота. С такой целью он обратился за кредитом. Алишер на сумму кредита хочет купить двух бычков. Он обычно закупает скот с рынка по дешевой цене и после одного месяца откорма выводит на скотный рынок на продажу. Одновременно Алишер работает на центральном рынке города в пункте денежных операций.
texts.en: Alisher is a resident of the town of Kulyab, engaged in raising livestock. He is 31 years old. He is married and is the father of two children. His father, mother and brothers also live with them. Alisher has 5 years of experience in buying and selling cattle. Now in its economy, there is one bull "Yaroslavl" breed. To promote the activities it is necessary to increase the number of livestock. To that end, he applied for a loan. Alisher on the amount of this loan wants to buy two calves. He usually buys cattle from the market at a cheap price and after one month of feeding displays the cattle market to sell. At the same time, Alisher works in the central market of the city at a bank branch.

loans.use: to buy two head of cattle for fattening and resale

loans.name: Mujeres Del Milenio Group

texts.es:
NANCY VILMA, tiene 55 años de edad, es casada y tiene 6 hijos jóvenes. Ella forma parte del grupo "Mujeres del Milenio" que está conformado por seis socias, todas caracterizadas por sus ansias de progreso y de hacer crecer sus negocios.
Nancy Vilma, se dedica desde hace quince años a la venta de salchipapas, sanguches, pollos broaster, y alternativamente caldo de gallina, que es muy requerido en época de invierno. Diariamente en horas de la noche inicia su trabajo para lo cual cuenta con un carrito sanguchero que ubica en la puerta de su casa, ya tiene clientes fijos y poco a poco aumenta también su clientela, le va bien en su negocio gracias a ello ha logrado apoyar a sus hijos en sus estudios.
El préstamo recibido lo invertirá en la compra de suministros para la preparación de sus alimentos, para lo cual realizará sus compras en mayor cantidad para poder obtener menores precios.
texts.en: Nancy Vilma is 55 years old. She is married and has six young children. She belongs to the group 'Mujeres del Milenio' (Women of the Millenium), along with five other women, who all have a goal in common: they want to get ahead in life and to make their businesses grow. Nancy Vilma has been making and selling salchipapas (a fast-food dish made of fried sausages and chips served together with various sauces), sandwiches, fried chicken, and chicken soup (very much in demand in the winter) for fifteen years. She works every day and starts preparing the food before dawn. She sells the food from a sandwich cart located in front of her house. She has many regular customers and keeps getting new ones. Thanks to her business's success, she was able to support her children during their studies. Nancy will use the loan to buy ingredients and supplies to prepare the food she sells. She will buy these wholesale in order to have better prices.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies for her fast-food stall.

loans.name: Mujeres De Fortaleza Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Mujeres de Fortaleza, está conformado por  8 integrantes, madres solteras responsables de 10 hijos. Son originarias del Malpaisillo, lugar que está ubicado en la zona norte del país. Estas personas se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras, responsables, con ganas de superación personal. En sus ratos libres de gustas disfrutar de tiempo de calidad con sus hijos, le prepara platillo típicos de la región como “Indio Viejo”  lamentablemente por falta de recursos económico no pudieron estudiar y se vieron obligadas a trabajar desde temprana edad, para ayudar con los gastos del hogar, por lo tanto luchar día a día para brindarles un futuro mejor a sus hijos.
La coordinadora del banco comunal es Aleyda y tiene por actividad económica  una pulpería ubicada en su casa de habitación, una pulpería es una pequeña tienda que vende productos comestibles en cantidades pequeñas como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, pan, leche, huevos, detergentes, jugos, tiste, cuajadas. Ella dedica a su negocio unas 12 horas diarias ofreciéndoles una su mercadería, actividad que la desempeña con mucho gusto. El objetivo del crédito es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio en la compra de productos comestibles, para que en un futuro no muy lejano pueda obtener mejores ingresos. El banco comunal mujeres de fortaleza agradecen la ayuda que los inversionistas kiva ofrecen a personas de escasos recursos y países  pobre como es Nicaragua para tener un medio de trabajo digno.
texts.en:
The communal bank “Mujeres de Fortaleza” (Women of Strength) is comprised of 8 members, all single mothers with 10 minor children under their responsibility. They come from Malpaisillo which is located in the north of the country.    These people are known for being hard-working and responsible and very determined to improve their situation.  In their free time they enjoy spending quality time with their children and cooking a typical dish of "Indio Viejo".  Unfortunately, they were unable to get an education because they had to start work at a very young age to help with household expenses; so they struggle every day to give their children a better future.

The coordinator of the communal bank is Aleyda who runs a grocery store out of her home.  It is small store and she sells small quantities of rice, beans, sugar, bread, milk, juices, soft drinks, custards and detergents.  She works some 12 hours a day and enjoys what she does.  The reason for the loan is to buy food products so she can improve her income in the near future.

The communal bank “Mujeres de Fortaleza” is grateful for the help that the Kiva lenders offer to people of limited resources and poor countries like Nicaragua so that they have a way to work with dignity.

loans.use: To buy food products such as rice, beans, sugar, bread, milk, eggs, juices, soft drinks, custards and detergents.

loans.name: Hector Ernesto

texts.es:
Hector tiene 35 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, en el distrito de la Tinguiña. Cada di se levanta muy temprano para poder trabajar como chofer de mototaxi, oficio con el cual puede obtener ingresos para poder solventar los gastos del hogar y poder sacer adelante a su familia, en especial por sus hijos que son muy pequeños. Cada día Hector trabaja alrededor de 9 horas y puede atender hasta 20 clientes al día; el cree que está saliendo adelante porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque es responsable cuando conduce.

Hector esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias al apoyo que le han brindado el podrá comprar materiales de construcción como cemento, fierros, entre otros y  podrá seguir construyendo su vivienda de material noble,  lo cual le permitirá tener una mejor calidad de vida y brindar más seguridad a su familia, así el podrá seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su más grande sueño:”Tener una empresa de taxis”.
texts.en:
Hector, 35, lives in the city of Ica in the Tinguiña District.  Every day he gets up early to work as a motor-taxi driver, to earn enough income to cover household expenses and provide for his family, especially his small children.  Hector works around nine hours and attends to up to 20 customers a day.  He believes business is going well for him because he is very kind to customers and responsible when he drives.

Hector is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to their support he will be able to buy construction materials such as cement, iron and other supplies to continue building his house out of solid materials.  This will give him a better quality of life and more safety for his family, and allow him to continue striving to reach his goal of "Having a taxi company".

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Dúo Solidario En "victoria San Lorenzo" Group

texts.es: Dúo Solidario “En Victoria de san Lorenzo” esta dpuo esta integrado pora la señora Zoila Rosaura de 27 años, ella tiene 4 hijos ella se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catalogo se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 10 años y esta solicitando un crédito para poder invertir en la compra de cosmeticos y en la compra de ropa de vestir (pantalones para dama, blusas, calcetines, calcetas, playeras) ya que tiene una gran demanda por sus clientes y solicitan su apoyo ya que de esta forma ella podra vender mas variedad en productos de cosmeticos y como tambien en ropa, esta muy contenta ya que Kiva se a caracterisado por ayudar a las personas que nececitan salir adelante en su negocio y ella espera que le puedan ayudar desde ya les agradese su atencion prestada.
texts.en: One of the members of Dúo Solidario "En Victoria de San Lorenzo" Group is Zoila Rosaura, 27, who has four chidlren.  She has been earning a living for ten years selling cosmetics by catalogue.  The loan she is requesting is to buy cosmetics and clothing (women's pants, blouses, socks, knitwear, and beachwear) since there is much demand among her customers.  She is requesting your support so she can sell a wider variety of cosmetics and clothing.  Kiva is known for helping people get ahead in their businesses and she hopes to receive your support for which she is grateful.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and clothing.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 60 años de edad, pero su espíritu y su alegría es de una joven de 20 años, ya que ella nos comenta que la vejes se lleva solo por fuera porque si eres joven por dentro la edad queda de lado, ella es muy entusiasta y trabajadora, su vivienda se ubica en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad que tiene un clima muy cálido y sobre todo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de uva, esparrago, pallares, paprika, entre otros, se encuentra la laguna de Huacachina, la cual es  muy visitada en todo el año por infinidad de turistas. A Rosa le gusta mucho su trabajo, pero cuando tiene un tiempito libre le gusta preparar uno de sus platillos favoritos el cual son los riquísimos “Tallarines Verdes”. Debido a sus pocos recursos económicos ella solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de secundaria pero le hubiera gustado mucho tener una carrera Universitaria.

Día a día Rosa trabaja en su negocio de venta de Calzados puerta a puerta, ella trabaja por las mañanas y por las tardes y puede atender hasta 10 clientes al día; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque ofrece productos de calidad y sobre todo a precios cómodos.

Rosa esta muy feliz y agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya es la segunda vez que le brindan su gran apoyo y en esta oportunidad podrá comprar zapatos y botas para ofrecer en su negocio ya que estamos en época de invierno y podrá tener más variedad de productos, así ella mejorara sus ingresos y su calidad de vida, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando y sobre todo seguir adelante en búsqueda de cumplir su más grande sueño:” Terminar de construir su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Rosa, 60, has the spirit and cheerfulness of a 20-year-old and believes that being old is only seen on the outside because if you are young on the inside, age does not matter.  She is very enthusiastic and hard-working and lives in the city of Ica which has a warm climate and where agricultural activity is developed, especially growing of crops such as grapes, asparagus, paprika and others.  The Huacachina Lagoon is also there and visited all year around by many tourists.  Rosa enjoys her work but when she has free time she likes to make one of her favorite dishes:  "Tallarines Verdes" (green noodles).  Because of her scarce economic resources she was only able to get a fifth grade education but would have liked to go to the university.

Every day Rosa works in her business selling shoes door to door.  She works in the morning and afternoon and sees up to ten customers a day.  She believes business is going well because she sells quality products at comfortable prices.

Rosa is very happy and grateful to Kiva lenders because this is the second time she receives their support.  On this occasion she plans to buy shoes and boots for the winter season.  This will giver her a wider variety of products so she can improve her income and quality of life.  This will allow her to continue working and striving to reach her goal of "Finishing construction of her own house".

loans.use: To buy winter shoes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for drinks and provisions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase materials and a new work kit for his business.

loans.name: Teddy

texts.en:
Teddy is married with seven children, five of whom go to school. She also takes care of additional family members, including her brother. She has a business raising chickens. She has been in this business for eight years. 

Teddy has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy more bags of chicken feed. She works at home and sells on a wholesale basis only six days a week. Her major business challenges include seasonality and poultry diseases. She generates additional income by selling scrap.   

Teddy aspires to own 2,000 chickens. She resides in her own house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and utility bills.

loans.use: To buy more bags of chicken feed.

loans.name: Suhrobjon

texts.ru: Сухробджону 19 лет. Он успешно окончил среднюю школу и поступил в Технологический Университет Таджикистана. Данное время он является студентом 1 курса. Он учится хорошо и отлично. Сухробджон любит все предметы, которые они учат в университете. Он не женат и живет с родителями. Он должен оплатить за учебный договор, но не имеет денег. Он запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора. Он ждет вашу доброту. В будущем он мечтает стать высококвалифицированным специалистом и работать в престижной организации. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Suhrobjon is 19 years old. He successfully graduated from high school and was admitted into the Technological University of Tajikistan. He is currently a first-year student. He is learning exceptionally well. Suhrobjon loves all of the subjects that he studies in university. He is unmarried and lives with his parents. He needs to pay for his tuition, but he does not have the money.  He is requesting a loan to pay for his university tuition. In the future, he dreams of becoming a highly-qualified specialist in a prestigious organization. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his tuition at university

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her existing hair accessories, earrings, bracelets, and chains capacity.

loans.name: Abu Bakarr Sidikie

texts.en: This is thirty- three year-old Abu Bakarr.  He is married and has one child, aged four. In 2010, Abu Bakarr established his DVD, VCD, and recharging cards business. He began his business after dropping out of school to be self reliant. His business is located in the city center and his main customers are adults. Working 7 days a week and 14 hours a day, he earns about 1,100,000 SLL every month from this business. He would like a loan of 3.000,000 SLL. Abu Bakarr requires a loan in order to pay for additional DVDs and recharge vouchers. He hopes that this loan can increase his stock and raise his profits. In the future, Abu Bakarr plans to improve his business and expand to the outskirts of town. He also hopes to be able to further his education and attain a degree. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for DVDs and recharge vouchers.

loans.name: Carmen Ventura

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 39 años de edad de estado civil Unión Libre tiene seis hijos vive con la compañera y con los hijos en el Recinto Terrenal perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla TERRENAL se encuentra ubicada el  recinto TERRENAL, perteneciente al cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 

Carmen se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y tiene una pequeñas piscina de truchas (peces) Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades para los cultivos y para los peces comprar balanceado, lombrices que es el alimento.  Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Pueblo Viejo. 

El sueño es tener dienro para construir la casa ya que viven en casa arrendada, en los tiempos libres le gusta ver television y cocinar los domigos platosd tipicos para la familia.
texts.en:
Carmen is 39 years old and in a common law marriage. She has six children and lives with her spouse and children in Recinto Terrenal, which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton, Los Ríos province. 

She belongs to the TERRENAL communal bank, located in the recinto TERRENAL, which belongs to the Pueblo Viejo canton. It is dedicated to farming and livestock work.  

Carmen works in farming. She grows corn and has a small trout pool. With the loan, she will be able to buy materials such as fertilizer and insecticides to avoid pests and disease for the crops. For the fish, she will buy balanced feed and worms, which are their food. She makes her purchases in the city of Pueblo Viejo. 

Her dream is to have money to build a house, since they rent. In her free time, she likes to watch television and cook traditional dishes on Sundays for the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, compost, insecticides, balanced fish feed, and earthworms.

loans.name: Abdu

texts.en:
Abdu is 23 years old, he lives in Sana'a, Yemen. He is a hardworking man who works in the ministry of defense getting a low salary that is not enough to cover household expenses. He faces a big challenge of not being able to buy household improvements. He intends to buy supplies for his house, so he has applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER to buy a fridge and washing machine for his house.

Abdu hopes to live comfortably with his family.

loans.use: to buy a fridge and washing machine for his house.

loans.name: La Gota * 26 Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento LA GOTA * 26,  Está  compuesto por ocho  integrantes todas mujeres la presidenta del banco es la Sra.   Maria tiene 33 años y 4 hijos de las edades de 2, 4, 7 y 12  años, todos se encuentran en edad escolar, se dedica a la venta y fabricación de artesanías de macramé para decoración del hogar, todo el trabajo lo realiza de manera, ella tiene su  taller  que se encuentra en la zona de Achachicala,  este préstamo es su primera  secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra.   Maria va a usar este préstamo para la compra materiales de construcción para refacción de su vivienda,   su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando su casa, la Sra.   Maria va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando materiales y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una tienda de artesanía grande y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela,  la Sra.   Maria es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: The LA GOTA * 26 communal bank is made up of eight members, all of them women. The president of the bank is Maria. She is 33 and has 4 children, aged  2, 4, 7 and 12. All of them are school aged. She makes and sells macrame items for home decor. She does all the work and has her workshop in the Achachicala area. This loan is her first cycle in the institution. Maria is going to use this loan to buy construction materials to do home repair. Her reason for asking for the loan is to continue improving her home. Maria is going to use her profits to keep buying materials and thus improve her income.  She wants her business to have a big artisanal crafts store and thus offer a better service to her customers. Maria is a very hardworking person who is happy with this opportunity being offered.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home repair.

loans.name: Dezi

texts.en: Dezi is married with five children and four of her children go to school. She also takes care of additional family members (older parents). She owns a restaurant and has been in this business for many years. She generates additional income through selling piped water and having a food stall. She works at the market and sells on a retail basis six days out of every week. Dezi has applied for a loan of 2,000,000 Uganda shillings from MCDT SACCO to buy more bunches of green bananas, sweet potatoes, onions, beef, chicken and ground nuts. She is aspiring to own a fully stocked restaurant and also to educate her children up to university. She resides in the family house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses includes school fees and paying for utility bills.

loans.use: to buy more bunches of green bananas, sweet potatoes, onions, beef, chicken and ground nuts.

loans.name: Confidence

texts.fr: Confidence est un homme âgé de 32 ans. Il est célibataire. Il fait le commerce de friperie depuis 2009. Il vend à tout le monde dans un marché de la place. Il achète ses produits au Port autonome de Lomé. Confidence a requis son troisième crédit à WAGES afin d’acheter des bals des friperies. Dans les prochaines années, Confidence voudrait construire sa propre boutique et exploiter convenablement son activité.
texts.en:
Confidence, age 32, is single. He's been selling secondhand clothing since 2009. He sells his products to the general public in a market of the city. 

He gets his supplies at the Autonomous Port of Lomé. Confidence is seeking his third loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy bales of used clothes.

In the forthcoming years, he would like to build his own store and run his business well.

loans.use: to buy bundles of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Kossi

texts.fr: Marié à une revendeuse de cuvettes, mr Kossi est père de famille. Il revend au marché depuis 1997 des chaussures. Son premier prêt lui permettra d’acheter des marchandises afin d’aider sa famille et rendre pérenne son activité.
texts.en:
Mr. Kossi is the father of a family and he is married to a reseller of plastic basins. Since 1997, he's been selling shoes at the market.

His first loan will enable him to buy shoes in order to help his family and make his business sustainable.

loans.use: to buy shoes

loans.name: Shaken

texts.ru: Шакен 63 года, вдова, дети Шакен уже взрослые и самостоятельные. Шакен имеет среднее образование, по характеру, спокойная, уравновешенная и трудолюбивая. Шакен в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, уже много лет занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с 25,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Шакен в хозяйстве имеется: 5 дойных коров, 3 теленка, 15 овец, а также имеет земельный надел в размере 1,72 ГА, на которой выращивает клевер. Ее деятельность приносит около 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц, от продажи молока, молочной продукции, яиц и кур, что служит основой для покрытия расходов на питание и бытовые нужды семьи. Дополнительным доходом считаются денежные переводы с России, где на заработках у Шакен находится сын и сноха. Доходы от хозяйства позволили Шакен женить своих детей и обустроить их. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Шакен обратилась в Микрофинансовый банк «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычков и овец. Доходы от кредита Шакен планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего хозяйства, а также, в будущем хочет сделать ремонт дома.
texts.en: Shaken is 63 years old and a widow. Her children are all grown up and self-sufficient. Shaken has a secondary education. She is composed, level-headed and hard working by nature. For the primary source of income for her family, Shaken has practiced animal husbandry for many years now, starting her business with 25,000 som (KGS). Thanks to her hard work, Shaken has on her farm: 5 milk cows, 3 calves, 15 sheep, and also has a 1.72 hectare plot of land on which she grows clover. Her business brings in about 20,000 som (KGS) per month from the sale of milk, dairy products, eggs, and chickens, which serves to cover the cost of food and daily living needs for her family. Remittances from Russia, where Shaken's son and  daughter-in-law earn a living, serve as additional income. The profits from Shaken's agricultural business allowed her to marry off her children and help them start their households. For the purpose of the further development of her business, Shaken turned to Microfinance Bank "Bai-Tushum and Partners" for a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy bulls and sheep. Shaken plans to invest the earnings from this loan in the further expansion of her farm and she would also like to repair her house in the future.

loans.use: to buy bulls and sheep

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали житель города Дангара. Ему  42 года. Он женат и имеет детей. С 2009 года Шерали занимается животноводческим бизнесом. Он закупает, откармливает и перепродает крупно-рогатый скот мясной породы. Его бизнес приносит ему стабильный доход и ему нравится его работа. У Шерали хороший опыт в разведении скота, так как в детстве вместе с отцом он разводил скот и теперь продолжает ремесло своего отца. Шерали сейчас хочет увеличить поголовье скота для развития бизнеса. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа двух голов бычков.
texts.en: Sherali lives in the city of Dangara. He is 42 years old. He is married and has children. Since 2009, Sherali has practiced animal husbandry. He buys, fattens up and then resells beef cattle. He business brings in a steady income and he likes his work. Sherali has a lot of experience in raising cattle, as in his childhood he and his father raised cattle and now he continues his father's trade. Sherali now wants to expand his stock of cattle for the development of his business. He is requesting a loan to buy two bulls.

loans.use: to buy two bulls to expand his stock of cattle

loans.name: Sarantañani Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento SARANTAÑANI,  Está  compuesto por ocho  integrantes todas mujeres la presidenta del banco es La Sra. Sonia  tiene 27 años, casada con dos hijos de las edades de 6 y 10 años,  ella se dedica a la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su  tienda de barrio que se encuentran en la zona de Alpacoma,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio como abarrotes, dulces y refrescos,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la mucha demanda que tiene y es ahí donde incrementa sus ventas, y necesita surtir su mercadería La Sra. Sonia  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que existen varias tiendas en la zona, va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de mas mercadería para surtir su tienda y seguir creciendo más cada día, su deseo para  su negocio es de seguir vendiendo y tener una tienda surtida, así poder hacer crecer su negocio mejorar sus ingresos y por ende mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y de su familia, se siente agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan a ella y a sus compañeras de grupo.
texts.en: The Sarantañani Communal Bank is comprised of eight members, all women.  Sonia is the bank’s president. She is 27 years old, and married with two children, ages six and ten.
